flavorText: Possession is ten-tenths of the law.

foreignData.flavorText: Besitz bedeutet zehn Zehntel des Gesetzes.
foreignData.name: Meisterdieb
foreignData.text: Wenn der Meisterdieb ins Spiel kommt, übernimm die Kontrolle über ein Artefakt deiner Wahl, solange du den Meisterdieb kontrollierst.

foreignData.flavorText: La posesión es diez décimas de la ley.
foreignData.name: Ladrón experto
foreignData.text: Cuando el Ladrón experto entre al campo de batalla, gana el control del artefacto objetivo mientras controles al Ladrón experto.

foreignData.flavorText:
La richesse consiste bien plus dans l'usage qu'on en fait que dans la possession.
—Aristote
foreignData.name: Maître voleur
foreignData.text: Quand le Maître voleur arrive sur le champ de bataille, acquérez le contrôle de l'artefact ciblé tant que vous contrôlez le Maître voleur.

foreignData.flavorText: Secondo la legge, non esistono gradi diversi di possesso.
foreignData.name: Maestro del Ladrocinio
foreignData.text: Quando il Maestro del Ladrocinio entra nel campo di battaglia, prendi il controllo di un artefatto bersaglio fintanto che controlli il Maestro del Ladrocinio.

foreignData.flavorText: 所有こそ法そのものだ。
foreignData.name: 練達の盗賊
foreignData.text: 練達の盗賊が戦場に出たとき、アーティファクト１つを対象とする。あなたが練達の盗賊をコントロールし続けているかぎり、あなたはそれのコントロールを得る。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ならず者

foreignData.flavorText: Quem foi à roça, perdeu a carroça.
foreignData.name: Ladrão Mestre
foreignData.text: Quando Ladrão Mestre entrar no campo de batalha, ganhe o controle do artefato alvo enquanto você controlar Ladrão Mestre.

foreignData.name: Искусный Похититель
foreignData.text: Когда Искусный Похититель выходит на поле битвы, получите контроль над целевым артефактом на все время, пока вы контролируете Искусного Похитителя.

foreignData.name: 神偷
foreignData.text: 当神偷进战场时，于你操控神偷的时段内，获得目标神器的操控权。

name: Master Thief
originalText: When Master Thief enters the battlefield, gain control of target artifact for as long as you control Master Thief.

rulings.text: If Master Thief leaves the battlefield, you no longer control it, and its control-change effect ends.
If Master Thief ceases to be under your control before its ability resolves, you won’t gain control of the targeted artifact at all.
If another player gains control of Master Thief, its control-change effect ends. Regaining control of Master Thief won’t cause you to regain control of the artifact.

text: When Master Thief enters the battlefield, gain control of target artifact for as long as you control Master Thief.
